item.description:
Join the Sierra Club's Chapter Political Committee for their celebration!
Wed., November 14 - (rsvp by Nov 12), 6:30pm
Cambridge Brewing Company
One Kendall Square, Cambridge
Short walk from Kendall Square T. Parking available at One Kendall Garage on Binney Street. See http://www.cambrew.co...

Join us as we celebrate our political victories and discuss next year's efforts. Our political endorsement program has been growing, and each year we are endorsing more candidates in every corner of the state.

This is a great opportunity to learn about the chapter's political endorsement program and get involved in next year's efforts to elect pro-environment legislators. All Sierra Club members are welcome! Please RSVP by Nov 12th so we can make reservations. This is a free event; members are responsible for their own food/drink.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Political Committee Victory Celebration
